languages.text: {n}Прикрывающий вас Соломон кидает люмен-гранату, и ее вспышка скрывает движения Глейто. Мгновение — и кибермастиф вцепляется в ногу второго телохранителя.{/n}
{n}Covering you, Solomorne throws a flash grenade such that its light masks Glaito's movements. A moment later, the cyber-mastiff's jaws clamp down on the second bodyguard's leg.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Прикрывающий вас Соломон кидает люмен-гранату, и ее вспышка скрывает движения Глейто. Мгновение — и кибермастиф вцепляется в ногу второго телохранителя.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Para cubrirte, Solomorne lanza una granada cegadora que oculta los movimientos de Glaito. Un instante después, las mandíbulas del cibermastín apresan la pierna del segundo guardaespaldas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Covering you, Solomorne throws a flash grenade such that its light masks Glaito's movements. A moment later, the cyber-mastiff's jaws clamp down on the second bodyguard's leg.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Para cubrirte, Solomorne lanza una granada cegadora que oculta los movimientos de Glaito. Un instante después, las mandíbulas del cibermastín apresan la pierna del segundo guardaespaldas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙及时进行援护，扔出了一颗闪光弹，迸射的强光掩盖了格雷托的动作。片刻之后，这只生化獒犬的尖牙就死死地钳住了另一位保镖的腿。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Covering you, Solomorne throws a flash grenade such that its light masks Glaito's movements. A moment later, the cyber-mastiff's jaws clamp down on the second bodyguard's leg.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙及时进行援护，扔出了一颗闪光弹，迸射的强光掩盖了格雷托的动作。片刻之后，这只生化獒犬的尖牙就死死地钳住了另一位保镖的腿。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tout en vous faisant barrage de son corps, Solomorne lance une grenade aveuglante dont l'éclat dissimule les mouvements de Glaito. Un instant plus tard, la mâchoire du cyber-mastiff se referme sur la jambe du second garde du corps comme un étau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Covering you, Solomorne throws a flash grenade such that its light masks Glaito's movements. A moment later, the cyber-mastiff's jaws clamp down on the second bodyguard's leg.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout en vous faisant barrage de son corps, Solomorne lance une grenade aveuglante dont l'éclat dissimule les mouvements de Glaito. Un instant plus tard, la mâchoire du cyber-mastiff se referme sur la jambe du second garde du corps comme un étau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはあなたをカバーし、閃光手榴弾を投げ、その光がグライトの動きを隠す。少しして、サイバーマスチフの顎が二人目のボディーガードの足に噛みつきぶら下がる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Covering you, Solomorne throws a flash grenade such that its light masks Glaito's movements. A moment later, the cyber-mastiff's jaws clamp down on the second bodyguard's leg.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはあなたをカバーし、閃光手榴弾を投げ、その光がグライトの動きを隠す。少しして、サイバーマスチフの顎がサルゴナの足に噛みつきぶら下がる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Seni kollayan Solomorne, ışığıyla Glaito'nun hareketlerini gizleyen bir ışıl bomba atıyor. Bir saniye sonrasında siber mastifin dişleri, ikinci korumanın bacağını kapıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Covering you, Solomorne throws a flash grenade such that its light masks Glaito's movements. A moment later, the cyber-mastiff's jaws clamp down on the second bodyguard's leg.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Seni kollayan Solomorne, ışığıyla Glaito'nun hareketlerini gizleyen bir ışıl bomba atıyor. Bir saniye sonrasında siber mastifin dişleri, ikinci korumanın bacağını kapıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne stellt sich schützend vor dich und wirft eine Blendgranate, um Glaitos Bewegungen zu verbergen. Einen Moment später verbeißt sich der Cyber-Mastiff in das Bein des zweiten Leibwächters.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Covering you, Solomorne throws a flash grenade such that its light masks Glaito's movements. A moment later, the cyber-mastiff's jaws clamp down on the second bodyguard's leg.{/n}
